Name: Six Second Slam
About the game: You have six seconds to race to the next level, before the door slams shut! Ten levels, six seconds each! Can you finish in a minute? How far can you get? Is it even possible? You must pass through ten doors, dodging everything you can and make it to the next level before the door slams shut! A door slams shut every six seconds, but for every second you save, that's more time to complete the next levels! Can you beat the final level? Find out, in Six Second Slam!
